refnamediv.refpurpose: This function is used to detect the corner points using FAST Alogrithm

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [ Location Count Metric ] = detectFASTFeatures( Image, Name, Value... )

listitem.para: Input Image, should be a 2-D grayscale. The Input Image should be real
Minimum Accepted Quality of Corners, can be specified as a scalar value between [0,1]. Default: 0.1
Minimum Intensity difference for Corners to be detected, can be specified as a scalar value between[0,1]. Default: 0.2
Specify a rectangular region of operation. Format [ x y width height ]. Default: [1 1 size(Image,2) size(Image,1)]
Set of x,y coordinates for the deteccted points
Value describing the strength of each detected Point

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The detectFASTFeatures function uses the Features from Accelerated Segment Test (FAST) algorithm to find feature points.
